column1: 19|Technology Director|"Snapshot:

This position offers the opportunity to help shape the future of a leading-edge company focusing on semiconductor material solutions. IQE has been in business for over 30 years and is a recognized global leader in the semiconductor wafer products industry. We're doing leading edge science and the team is passionate about it.

719|Regional IT Manager|"Regional IT Manager

column2: to ensure critical systems and applications are available to support patient care and business operations
column3: while maintaining a high degree of customer satisfaction. The Regional IT Manager acts as the senior network and system administrator for the organization and will supervise junior staff as assigned. The Regional IT Manager is also required to work directly with the Senior IT Director and other Regional IT Managers in strategic planning and implementation of systems to support the mission and vision of DOCS.
